originalText.text: Jim is an exceptional tutor who provided me with immense help while I prepared for my Series 7 exam. This was an exam I struggled with a lot, and Jim was incredibly supportive as he guided my studying. He is very, very knowledgeable but teaches in an approachable way - options, for example, was my weakest subject and Jim patiently provided very helpful analogies and in-depth content explanations that helped me master that section of the exam. Jim helped me overcome the sections of the exam I found the most challenging, and I felt very confident in my knowledge and progress by the end of our lessons together. Jim’s support as a tutor was widespread, ranging from helping me organize a study routine as I juggled exams and a full-time job and helping me gain confidence in the challenging Series 7 content. Jim was also flexible with his availability, which made him easy to work with. I’m very grateful for Jim’s work and I am certain that I will seek Jim’s support again in the future should I ever need to take other certification exams. I highly recommend Jim and Professional Exam Tutoring to anyone who finds themselves at the challenging exam stage of their financial careers!

originalText.text: Jim is an incredible tutor! I worked with Jim to pass my Series 86 exam and would highly recommend his services to anyone. Jim was incredibly clear when answering my questions. He walked me through countless practice problems and provided real world examples that helped me contextualize each test topic. He also provided helpful goalposts for me to achieve ahead of my test date. I would absolutely work with him again.

originalText.text: Jim was an amazing tutor for my Series 63! Thanks to him, I passed my exam yesterday. He was great at breaking down concepts that I was struggling with, and helped me to focus on the right kind of key words and little test tips when taking the exam. I did 4 sessions with him total — in all of our sessions, he was always incredibly patient with me and I found myself learning the different concepts a lot better because of real life examples that he would give. Thank you so much Jim!

originalText.text: Jim was an incredible tutor and helped me to pass the Series 86! For an exam with very little study materials out there, I am so grateful for Jim’s help throughout my journey and his ability to breakdown complex topics and provide further insight. I highly recommend Jim as a tutor and should I ever need to take another exam I will definitely be utilizing Jim as a resource!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Jim as a tutor for anyone in need of assistance. He is an exceptional tutor who played a vital role in my success with the series 86 and series 87 exams. Jim's extensive knowledge and expertise in these subjects were invaluable, and his patience made the learning process enjoyable. His insightful tips and guidance were instrumental in helping me pass these exams. Working with Jim was an absolute joy, and I can confidently say that he is a top-notch tutor.
